text: Three months ago, despite my better judgment

Gallium, the main ingredient in liquid metal, can penetrate the porous grain structure of aluminum and it chemically

The liquid metal on the dye is just as liquidy as it was when I applied it.

only dries out if it's exposed to direct airflow. Which, if your cooler is seated properly--it won't be

which is excellent! And I was probably worried a little bit over nothing.

it really only provided an improvement of about 7 percent over a high-quality thermal paste
which is much lower risk, and doesn't require annual replacement.
